Title: Prohibits the sale of covered license plate frames
Summary: Prohibits the sale of covered license plate frames; defines a covered license plate frame to mean any glass or plastic material, artificial or synthetic material or substance that conceals or obscures a license plate or that distorts a recorded or photographic image of such license plate.
LawCode: Add ยง391-uu, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of covered license plate frames
